title: Compromise me
author: Compromise me
created_time: April 21, 2023, 06:23:54 PMLast edit: June 01, 2023, 03:12:25 PM by Compromise me
content: Hello everyone, I hope you all are doing well and Eid Mubarak to the entire Bitcoin Talk community I hope this beautiful day brings joy prosperity and blessings for you and your loved ones. On this occasion of Eid I pray that you keep close ties with your loved ones and create beautiful memories. I send you all lots of joy progress and blessings.This beautiful sentiment reminds us how important it is to share our unity solidarity and happiness with those around us. Let's celebrate this special day by showing love and kindness to everyone whether they are our family friends or strangers.On this occasion our prayer is that we all achieve peace happiness and success for ourselves and everyone around the world. This day marks the beginning of a new chapter in our lives full of hope joy and endless possibilities.Once again Eid Mubarak to you and your loved ones. May God bless you with good health wealth and happiness always.https://images.app.goo.gl/pxFVmEdLNdb1aLWZ6

comments.author: Qiubell5
comments.body: thank you for the prayers you have said for all of us. I hope we can all meet again with the month of Ramadan next year.

comments.author: Zlantann
comments.body: Quote from: Qiubell5 on April 22, 2023, 01:27:34 PMthank you for the prayers you have said for all of us. I hope we can all meet again with the month of Ramadan next year.Eid Mubarak to all the Muslim faithful and the entire bitcointalk community. It was indeed a blessed month of Ramadan and I am happy to be alive to see this year's Salah. But I am saddened by the war in Sudan. The war has affected the country that the end of Ramadan and the Salah celebration turned into a time of mourning and sorrow.Instead of pursuing the path of peace Generals Abdel Fattah al-Burhan and Mohamed Hamdan Dagalo have been blinded by the quest for power. This struggle has led to the injury and death of many faithful and millions are now homeless and have no access to water and food. We must keep praying for the mercy of God on Sudan so that negotiation and compromise should lead to peace and stability.

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: Hope you all had a good Eid my brothers, As-salamu alaykum. It is a time to celebrate with friends & family after a long fasting period. We are all so strong as we follow the Quran.Alhamdulillah.
